title: Castle of the Ember Crown
intro_text: You stand within the ruined walls of an ancient castle. Find the Ember Crown and escape before the guard patrols return.

Courtyard.description: A windswept courtyard of cracked stone. Vines climb the walls. A great hall lies north; the stables are east.

npcs.name: guard
npcs.dialogue: Halt… (He looks at you through his blood soaked eyes.) If you value your life, turn back now.(He says with his last dying breath).

Stables.description: Old stables filled with broken stalls and rotten hay. Something glints beneath a collapsed saddle rack.

Armoury.description: Rusty suits of armour stand like silent sentries. A cracked shield hangs on the wall. A narrow stair goes up.

Battlements.description: You step onto the battlements. The world stretches out beyond the castle walls. A cold wind bites at your face.

WatchTower.description: A small watchtower room with arrow slits. A locked trapdoor leads down into darkness.

GreatHall.description: A vast hall with torn banners. A staircase rises to the east. A heavy door to the north bears a crown symbol.

RoyalStairs.description: A grand staircase with cracked marble steps. The air smells of dust and old incense.

Chapel.description: A candleless chapel. The altar is bare, but faint warmth seems to linger here.

ThroneDoor.description: A reinforced door with a crown emblem. The lock looks ancient but strong.

Dungeon.description: The dungeon is damp and pitch black. You hear chains clink in the dark. Without light, every step feels dangerous.

ThroneRoom.description: The throne room is eerily still. On the throne rests the Ember Crown, glowing faintly like coal.

EscapeTunnel.description: A narrow tunnel leading away from the castle. A rusted grate blocks the exit to freedom.

Freedom.description: Moonlight spills onto the forest path beyond the castle. If you have the crown, this is your way out.

locked_exits.fail_text: The crowned door is locked tight. You need an iron key.
The trapdoor drops into darkness. You shouldn't go down without a lantern.
The rusted grate won't budge. You need something to pry it open.

ration.text: You eat a ration and steady your nerves. You feel you can press on a little longer.

win_condition.text: You escape the castle with the Ember Crown. The legends were true — and now it is yours. You win!

lose_condition.text: Torches flare in the distance — the patrol has returned. You're caught within the castle walls. You lose.
